announcements.title: Come Watch! The 'F' Word Improv Group
announcements.message: Need a break from studying? COME WATCH The 'F' Word Improv Group! The show will take place on Monday, December 16 at 7pm in the theatre building. No ticket required - come laugh with us!

announcements.title: Missing from Writing Center
announcements.message: he Writing Center is missing a couple Hacker manuals - so if one stowed away in your backpack and needs to be returned - we would really appreciate having it back! Students and tutors need them.

announcements.title: Intern for Central College Abroad
announcements.message: Want to have a fun, upbeat internship on campus? Apply for one of Central College Abroad's two awesome internships for spring 2014 on CareerLink on my.central.edu.
